item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Bitwarden SDK relicensed from proprietary to GPLv3 (498 points | 184 comments)

3. OpenFeature – a vendor-agnostic, community-driven API for feature flagging (89 points | 24 comments)

7. Never Missing the Train Again (255 points | 92 comments)

15. Quit Social Media (2016) (97 points | 90 comments)

28. Data viz project that maps all earthquakes by magnitude (71 points | 16 comments)
29. Riot Games: Peeking into Valorant's Netcode (2020) (148 points | 64 comments)
30. Boeing 787s must be reset every 51 days or 'misleading data' is shown (2020) (155 points | 157 comments)
